descriptionHtml:
This small Breeze Home addon is my very first attempt at modding.
I liked the idea of owning my own crafting workshop and enchantment Room.

The addon features the smithing set and an enchantment table, a smelter and a mine area with All the Ore deposits minus, Gold, Silver and the Soul Gem Deposits.

I\'v added two files, The first all chests and cabinets are empty, and the second, the enchantment table contains filled soul gems 10 of each, and the chest closest to the Armoring bench contains 10 ingots of each Ore minus, Gold, Silver. Both containers are set to respawn.

As this is my very first mod ever, technical advice will be welcomely recieved.
Please endorce if you like this addon.

Thanks to Morden Cross for testing.
author: Arkm Stick
